name: OMNISCAN

indications.text: omniscan gadolinium-based contrast agent diagnostic magnetic resonance imaging ( mri ) indicated intravenous : visualize lesions abnormal vascularity brain , spine , associated tissues ( 1.1 ) facilitate visualization lesions abnormal vascularity within thoracic , abdominal , pelvic cavities , retroperitoneal space ( 1.2 )

contraindications.text: cns – adults pediatrics ; 2 16 years age : 0.2 ml/kg ( 0.1 mmol/kg ) ( 2.1 , 2.4 ) body – adults pediatrics ; 2 16 years age : kidney : 0.1 ml/kg ( 0.05 mmol/kg ) intrathoracic , intra-abdominal , pelvic cavities : 0.2 ml/kg ( 0.1 mmol/kg ) ( 2.2 , 2.4 )

warningsAndPrecautions: omniscan ( gadodiamide ) injection sterile , clear , colorless slightly yellow , aqueous solution containing 287 mg/ml gadodiamide rubber stoppered vials . omniscan supplied following sizes : 10 ml vial , box 10 ( ndc 0407-0690-10 ) 15 ml fill 20 ml vial , box 10 ( ndc 0407-0690-15 ) 20 ml vial , box 10 ( ndc 0407-0690-20 )
adverseReactions: omniscan contraindicated patients : chronic , severe kidney disease ( glomerular filtration rate , gfr < 30 ml/min/1.73m2 ) acute kidney injury prior hypersensitivity omniscan
indications_original: OMNISCAN is a gadolinium-based contrast agent for diagnostic magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) indicated for intravenous use to: Visualize lesions with abnormal vascularity in the brain, spine, and associated tissues ( 1.1 ) Facilitate the visualization of lesions with abnormal vascularity within the thoracic, abdominal, pelvic cavities, and the retroperitoneal space ( 1.2 )
contraindications_original: CNS – Adults and Pediatrics; 2 to 16 years of age: 0.2 mL/kg (0.1 mmol/kg) ( 2.1 , 2.4 ) Body – Adults and Pediatrics; 2 to 16 years of age: Kidney: 0.1 mL/kg (0.05 mmol/kg) Intrathoracic, intra-abdominal, and pelvic cavities: 0.2 mL/kg (0.1 mmol/kg) ( 2.2 , 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
OMNISCAN (gadodiamide) Injection is a sterile, clear, colorless to slightly yellow, aqueous solution containing 287 mg/mL of gadodiamide in rubber stoppered vials. OMNISCAN is supplied in the following sizes:
                  10 mL vial, box of 10 (NDC 0407-0690-10) 15 mL fill in 20 mL vial, box of 10 (NDC 0407-0690-15) 20 mL vial, box of 10 (NDC 0407-0690-20)
adverseReactions_original:
OMNISCAN is contraindicated in patients with:
                  
                     Chronic, severe kidney disease (glomerular filtration rate, GFR < 30 mL/min/1.73m2) or acute kidney injury  
                     Prior hypersensitivity to OMNISCAN
